Package controller

Class TicketManager

java.lang.Object
controller.TicketManager
public class TicketManager
extends java.lang.Object
The class that manages all tickets and create ticket IDs
Author:
Yew Wei Chee

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String addTicket​(java.lang.String slotID, java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats, java.util.List<Ticket.TicketType> types)
    The function to add a new ticket Automatically generate a ticket ID using the format: XXXXXXyyyyMMddHHmmss where: - XXXXXX is the slot ID - yyyy is the year - MM is the month - dd is the day - HH is the hour - mm is the minute - ss is the second Automatically change the availability of seats to not available after adding the ticket
    static TicketManager getInstance()
    The function to get the instance of TicketManager object
    Ticket getTicket​(java.lang.String ticketID)
    The function to get a ticket based on its ticket ID
    java.util.List<Ticket> getTickets​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ticketIDs)
    The function to get a list of tickets based on their ticket IDs
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    The function to test TicketManager Not included in real application
    void printTicketDetails​(Slot slot, java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats, java.util.List<Ticket.TicketType> ticketType)
    The function to print ticket details, used to print confirmation before payment
    void printTicketDetails​(java.lang.String ticketID)
    The function to print ticket details
    Ticket removeTicket​(java.lang.String ticketID)
    The function to remove a ticket

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TicketManager getInstance()
      The function to get the instance of TicketManager object
      Returns:
      The TicketManager object

    • addTicket

      public java.lang.String addTicket​(java.lang.String slotID, java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats, java.util.List<Ticket.TicketType> types)
      The function to add a new ticket Automatically generate a ticket ID using the format: XXXXXXyyyyMMddHHmmss where: - XXXXXX is the slot ID - yyyy is the year - MM is the month - dd is the day - HH is the hour - mm is the minute - ss is the second Automatically change the availability of seats to not available after adding the ticket
      Parameters:
      slotID - The slot ID
      seats - The seats booked, a list of seat IDs
      types - The type of tickets, a list of TicketType If 3 adult tickets are booked, the list should be [ADULT, ADULT, ADULT]
      Returns:
      A boolean variable indication whether the operation is successful or not Return false if seats passed in contains booked seats or has no seats Return false if ticket ID already exists Return false if number seats is not equal to number of ticket types

    • removeTicket

      public Ticket removeTicket​(java.lang.String ticketID)
      The function to remove a ticket
      Parameters:
      ticketID - The ticket ID to be removed
      Returns:
      The removed ticket

    • getTicket

      public Ticket getTicket​(java.lang.String ticketID)
      The function to get a ticket based on its ticket ID
      Parameters:
      ticketID - The ticket ID to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The ticket object corresponds to the ticket ID

    • getTickets

      public java.util.List<Ticket> getTickets​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ticketIDs)
      The function to get a list of tickets based on their ticket IDs
      Parameters:
      ticketIDs - The list of ticket IDs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The list of ticket objects

    • printTicketDetails

      public void printTicketDetails​(java.lang.String ticketID)
      The function to print ticket details
      Parameters:
      ticketID - The ticketID of the ticket

    • printTicketDetails

      public void printTicketDetails​(Slot slot, java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats, java.util.List<Ticket.TicketType> ticketType)
      The function to print ticket details, used to print confirmation before payment
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot booked
      seats - The seats booked
      ticketType - The list of ticket types chosen

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The function to test TicketManager Not included in real application
      Parameters:
      args -
